San Bernardino ride: Chur to Bellinzona Posauto Station in Chur (Photo: PostAuto AG) What seems like a very "ordinary" trip to get you from A to B is actually quite the scenic ride. Not only is it the fastest way to travel between Chur and the Canton of Ticino, it's also paired with some pretty impressive views. After leaving Chur, you'll pass through the Domleschg Valley with its high density of castles, as well as the dramatic Viamala Gorge.
